m_descr:
This app allows you to send notifications by e-mail.
A virtual device is generated, that will send you an e-mail to the deposited adress with each command 'on'.
With the checkbox you are able to hide the widget in elements view.
rl_hidden: Hide the created widget on elements view.
h_mail_to: The mail address, that should receive the notifications.
subject: Z-Way Notification
